Artisto - Unleash Your Inner Artist ğŸ¨

Brief: Artisto is an exceptional mobile application that transforms your videos into stunning artworks with the touch of a button. Inspired by iconic artists such as Van Gogh, Picasso, and Dali, Artisto empowers its users to create Hollywood-style videography, right from the comfort of their smartphones.

Community: For those with a competitive spirit or seeking inspiration, Artisto hosts the #ArtistoBattle on various social media platforms. Immerse yourself within a community of fellow artists and enthusiasts as you compete for the honor of having your photo featured as a filter cover within the app.
